timestamps.text: Na’lain Shareef Kay Badge Kay Naksh Ki Shara'i Haisiyat Kia Hai ?

Baaz Barelvi Ulama Ka Moaqqaf Hai Ki Durood E Ibrahimi Sirf Namaz Ke Sath Khas Hai , Kia Namaz Ke Alawa Durood E Ibrahimi Parhna Jaiz Hai ?
Baaz Log Kehte Hain Ki Durood Shareef Wahid Ibadat Hai Jo Allah Bhi Karta Hai Aur Yeh Namaz Se Bhi Afzal Hai Kia Aisa Aqeedah Rakhna Durust Hai ?

Durood E Ibrahimi Mein Aal E Ibrahim Se Kya Muraad Hai Kyonki Yahoodion Ki Jaanib Se Yeh Tanz Kiya Jata Hai Ki Hum Bani Israel Hi Aal E Ibrahim Hain Aur Hum Par Durood Parhe Bina Musalmano Ki Namaz Mukammal Nahi Hoti ?

Yeh Sunni Durood Aur Shiah Durood Alag Alag Kyon Hain Jabki Dono Aik Hi Nabi ﷺ Ko Maan Nay Wale Hain ?
Ahl E Tashaiyyo Hazraat Ruku Aur Sajdon Mein Bhi Durood Shareef Parhtay Hain Jabki Ahl E Sunnat Hazraat Kewal Tashahud Mein Kya Wo Bhi Ruku Aur Sujood Mein Durood Shareef Parh Sakte Hain ?
Nabi E Kareem ﷺ Ka Jab Naam E Mubarak Muhammad ﷺ Likha Jata Hai Hai To Jo Suad Lagaya Jata Hai Ya Salaam Lagaya Jata Hai Kya Ye Jaiz Hai ?

Kia Durood O Salaam Kewal Nabi ﷺ Ke Sath Khaa Hai Ya Doosrey Anbiya A.s. Ke Liye Bhi ﷺ Ka Istamaal Kiya Jaa Sakta Hai Aur Yeh Bhi Bata Dein Ki Adam, Ibraheem, Moosa Aur Isa علیہ السلام Ki Tarah Kya Nabi ﷺ Ko Bhi علیہ السلام Keh Sakte Hain Aur Kya Sayyidna Ali, Hassan Aur Hussain A.s. Ke Saath Bhi علیہ السلام Keh Sakte Hain ?
Agar Aik Majlis Mein Baar Baar Nabi ﷺ Ka Naam E Mubarak Aaye To Kya Baar Baar Durood Shareef Parhna Zaroori Hai Ya Sirf Aik Martaba Parh Lena Hi Kaafi Hoga ?
Islam Ne Kin Kin Mauqon Par Durood O Salam Parhne Ko Ibadaat Bataya Hai Kia Namaz Aur Namaz E Janaza Ke Alaawa Bhi Kahi Iska Zikr Hai ?
Kia Aisi Koi Hadees Hai Ki Insaan Ki Dua Uss Waqt Tak Qubool Hi Nahin Hoti Aur Zameen Aur Aasmaan Ke Darmyan Latki Rahti Hai Jab Tak Durood O Salaam Na Parha Jaaye ?
Agar Koi Shakhs Namaz Mein Durood Shareef Parhna Bhool Gaya To Kya Uski Namaaz Ho Jayegi ?
Kya Munkireen E Hadees Apni Namaz Mein Durood Shareef Parhte Hain Agar Haan To Kaun Sa Durood Shareef Parhtey Hain ?
Aik Aam Aadmi Ko Durood Shareef Ke Mutaliq Sahih Ul Isnaad Ahadees Aur Man Kharant Ahadees Ka Kaisa Pata Chalega ?

Durood Shareef Ke Fazayl Par Barelvi Aalim Mufti Ameen Sahab Ki Kitab Aab E Kauthar Aur Deobandi Aalim Zakariya Kandhalvi Ki Kitab Fazayl E Durood Ke Waqiyaat Jinhe Aap Ghalat Samajhte Hain Dar Asal Buzurgon Ki Kitabon Se Hi Liye Gaye To Aap In Buzurgon Ko Ghalat Kyon Nahi Kahtay ?
Kia Koi Aisa Durood Shareef Ya Wazeefa Hai Jis Say Hum Gunahgaaro Ko Khuwab Mein Nabi ﷺ Ka Deedar Ho Jaaye Agar Aisa Koi Wazeefa Hai To Please Hum Logon Ko Zaroor Batayein ?

Abdullah Bin Umar R.a. Ne Ek Aadmi Ko Cheenk Ke Jawab Mein Alhamdullillah Ke Sath Wasalamu Ala Rasoolallah ﷺ Parhne Par Mana Kiya Tha Par Ali Bhai To Baar Baar Apnay Lectures Mein Durood Shareef Parhwate Hain Kya Unka Yeh Amal Bhi Bid'dat Mein Shumaar Hoga ?

Kia Mard Ya Aurat Napaaki Ki Halat Mein Durood Shareef Parh Sakte Hain Maslan Halat E Janabat Ya Auraton Ke Makhsoos Ayyam Mein Aur Yeh Bhi Bata Dein Ki Kya Namaz Ki Tarah Durood Shareef Parhne Ke Liye Bhi Ba Wudhu Hona Parega ?
Kya Auratein Nangay Sar Durood Shareef Ya Adhan Ka Jawab De Saktin Hain Ya Sar Dhaanpna Zaroori Hai ?
Aapki Favourite Jamat Matlab Tableeghi Jamaat Walay Aksar Ye Hadees Bayan Kartay Hain Ki Juma Ke Din 80 Baar Ye Durood Parhne Se 80 Saal Ke Gunaah Muaf Ho Jaate Hain Kia Unka Yeh Dawah Sahih Hai ?
Kya Durood Shareef Mein Ahl E Bait A.s. Aur Azwaj E Rasool ﷺ Aur Ashaab R.a. E Rasool ﷺ Ka Zikr Karna Bhi Zaroori Hai ?
Durood E Lakhi, Durood E Maahi, Durood E Ghausiya, Durood E Taj Aur Qaseedah Burda Shareef Mein Aane Wale Alfaaz Inka Wajeefey Ke Taur Par Parhna Kaisa Hai ?
Kya Hajiyon Ke Zariye Nabi ﷺ Par Durood O Salaam Bhijwana Jaiz Hai Baaz Log To Parchiyon Pe Naam Likhwa Ke Bhejte Hain Aisa Karna Kaisa Hai ?

Nabi ﷺ Ka Farmaan Hai Ki Meri Qabar Par Allah Ek Farishta Mukarrar Farmayega Jo Door Ya Nazdeeq Se Durood O Salaam Sun Ne Ki Taaqat Rakhega Aur Aap ﷺ Ko Batayega Ki Fulaan Bin Fulaan Ne Aap Par Durood O Salaam Bheja Hai Hai Iski Kya Haqeeqat Hai ?
Kia Ye Hadees Sahih Hai Jo Shakhs Meri Qabr Par Durood Shareef Parhta Hai Uska Durood Mein Sunta Hoon Aur Baaqiyon Ka Durood Mujh Tak Pahunchaya Jaata Hai ?
Kya Yeh Baat Sahih Hai Ki Hazrat Adam A.s. Aur Sayyedah Hawwa S.a. Ke Nikaah Ke Waqt 20 Baar Durood Shareef Unka Haq Meher Rakha Gaya Tha ?
Agar Koi Shakhs Kitab Likhe Aur Usme Wo Muhammad ﷺ Ke Naam Ke Sath Durood Shareef Bhi Likhe To Kya Jab Tak Wo Parha Jayega Tab Tak Likhne Wale Ko Uska Sawaab Milta Rahega ?
Jo Mujh Par Durood Na Parhe Uska Wuzu Nahin Hai Kya Yeh Baat Theek Hai ?
Zard Rang Ke Libaas Aur Imama Ke Baaray Mein Aik Aham Suwaal ?

Pm Imran Khan Ne Tamam Makatib E Fiqr Ke Ulama Ko Khitab Karte Hue Yaksa Taleem Ke Nizam Ki Baat Ki Hai Ispar Ali Bhai Ka Kya Moaqqaf Hai?
Zameen Bos Hone Wali Aur Toot Phoot Ka Shikar Honay Wali Qabron Ki Kya Murrammat Karwana Islam Mein Jaiz Hai Kyun Keh Amooman Murrammat Karnay Walay Yeh Kaam Karne Par Aamadah Nahi Hotay?

Aisi Aurat Jisme Medically Maa Bannay Ki Salahiyat Maujood Hi Naa Ho Kia Wo Aisay Injections Use Kar Ke Jis Se Uske Jism Me Doodh Ban Jaye Aur Wo Use Apne Adopted Betay Ko Pila De To Kya Wo Bacha Uska Mehram Ban Jayega?
Ghar Kay Carpets Par Amooman Chotay Bachay Peshaab Kar Dete Hain Aur Inko Baar Baar Dhona Bahut Mushkil Kaam Hai Kya Aisay Carpets Kay Upar Mota Mussalla Bicha Kar Namaz Parh Sakte Hain?
Mein Germany Main Rahta Hun Yahan Log Faaltu Purana Saaman Maslan Maiz Kursi Ghar Ke Bahar Phenk Dete Hain Mein Uski Marammat Karwa Ke Farokht Kar Deta Hu Kya Mera Ye Business Halal Hai?
Amooman Log Europe Wagairah Me Khane Ka Samaan Phenk Daitay Hain Mein Wo Samaan Wahan Ke Janwaro Ko Khila Deta Hoon Kya Iska Sawab Mujhe Milega Ya Jiska Khana Hai Usko?
Main Jab Jawan Thi Maine Apni Saas Ka Zewar Churaya Tha Ab Mein Khud Burhi Ho Chuki Hoon Meri Saas Bhi Faut Ho Chuki Hain Mein Apne Gunaah Ki Tauba Kaise Karun?
Javed Ahmed Ghamidi Sahab Ne Canada Me Sheikh Ul Islam Tahirul Qadri Se Mulaqat Ki Hai Toh Ali Bhai Se Request Hai Ki Woh Bhi Pahli Fursat Me Dr.tahirul Qadri Se Mulaqat Kar Lein?
Hamaray Han Zyada Baarishen Rukwane Kay Liye Masajid Se Azaanein Dilwayi Jaati Hain Kya Ye Amal Sunnat Se Saabit Hai?
Agar Namaz Me 4 Ki Bajai 5 Rakat Parh Dein To Kya Sajda Sahaw Karna Hoga?
Mere Betey Ki Tabiyat Aksar Kharab Rahti Hai Log Kehte Hain Iska Aqeeqah Kar Dein...meri Maali Halat Bhi Achi Nahi Hai?
Mera Shauhar Inteqal Kar Gaya Hai Aur Mein Bohot Boorhi Hoon Kya Mujhe Bhi Iddat Guzarni Paregi Agar Haan To Islaami Maah Ke Hisab Se Ya Angrezi Maah Ke Hisab Se?
Baaz Maghrabi Mumalik Mein Shahriyat Haasil Karne Ke Liye Kya Dil Me Imaan Ka Pukhta Irada Rakhte Hue Kaaghazon Mein Apne Aap Ko Qaadiyani Declare Kar Sakte Hain?

timestamps.text: Ek Deobandi Molana Ka Fatwa Jo Shia Kisi Sahabi Pe Shabo Satam Kerta Hai Woh Kafir Hai Aur Uss Say Sunni Ka Nikah Haram Hoga.
Ali Bhai Ne Majlis No 80 Mein Drood Ibrahimi Ki Jagah Bar Bar Shia Wala Drood Parha Aur Parhwaya. Kya Drood Shareef Ka Shia Wala Version Durust Hai? Aur Iska Koi Reference Bhi Den?
Surah Baqra Mein Allah Ne Lafz Mola Ka Istamal Kya Hai Aur Sahi Muslim Mein Bhi Hai Allah K Ilawa Koi Mola Nahi To Phir Sunni Aur Shia Dono K Ulama Hazrat Ali Ko Mola Kyun Kahtay Hain?

Hazrat Ali Ne Apni Khilafat Main Jung E Jamal, Safeen Aur Neharwan Laren. Lekin Khulfa Rashdeen K Dor Mein Junge Yarmook Aur Jange Qadsia Mein Shirkat Nahi Farmai. Iski Wajah Kya Hai, Wazahat Farma Den?
Ahle Tashee K Baray Zimaydar Ulama Bhi Harzat Umar Farooque Ko Hazrat Fatima K Qatil K Tor Pe Paish Kya Jata Hai Aur Yehi Buhtaan Molana Ishaaq Pe Lagaya Jata Hai?
Ali Bhai Ne Bhi Aam Logo Ki Rawish Pe Chaltay Howay Ilzam Lagaya Hai, Muhammad Bin Qasim Ka Sindh Pe Hamla Duniyavi Garz Pe Tha Na K Deani. Isse Ruju Farmain?
Sulah Imam Hassan Bin Ali (Ra) Ka Koi Lecture Hai To Bta Den Aur Agar Nahi Hai To Record Kerwa Den, Agar Koi Kitaab Hai To Uska Bhii Bta Den?
Agar Koi Khawand Apni Biwi Ko Parday Se Rokay Ya Phir Apnay Rishte-daro Se Parday Kernay Say Mana Karay To Kya Iss Bina Pe Aurat Talaq Ya Khula Le Sakti Hai?

Aurat K Liye Shrai Haq Mahar 32 Rupay 8 Aanay Hai. Kya Waqai Islam Mein Murd Itni Kum Qeemat Pe Nikah Ker Sakta Hai?
Agar Koi Aurat Dosri Shadi (Halala) Ker Kay Bila Wajah Khulaa Ya Talaq Le Ker Phir Se Pehlay Khawind K Pass Anay Ka Bahana Ker Le To Kya Hoga?
Ashooray Kay Rozay Se Mutaliq Ahadith Aise Ashaab Ne Riwayat Ki Jati Hai Jo Kumsin Thay Ya Abhi Muslim Bhi Nahi Howay Thay, Aisi Sorat Mein Unki Ahadith Kaise Qabile Qabool Hongi?

Ahle Tashee Ulama Noha Aur Maatam K Liye Sydena Yaqoob (As) K Girya Ki Misaal Detay Hain Aur Sydena Hamza Ibne Abdul Mutlib Per Nabi (Saw) K Hukum Per Noha Se Daleel Detay Hain. Apka Ispe Kya Moqaf Hai?
Islam 360 Application Search Mein Nahi Aa Rahi. Iska Issue Aur Solution.
Sahi Muslim Ki Hadith K Tahat Zuhur Aur Asar Ko Jama Kya Jaa Sakta Hai Aur, Maghrib Aur Ishaa Ko. Kya Waqt Ki Kami Ki Wajah Se 12 Sunnat Rakaat Bhi Jamma Ho Sakti Hain?
Kya Dantoo Ko Seedha Kerne K Liye Braces Lagai Jaa Saktay Hain?
Nabi (Saw) Ek Sahabi Ko Dekh K Hans Diye Jinka Sirf Darhi Ka Ek Baal Tha. Iss Waqai Ki Kya Haqiqat Hai?

Akhrat K Din Kaan Aankh Aur Aqal Jaise Naimtoo K Baray Mein Pocha Jai Ga. Lekin Jo Deen K Mamlay Mein Sawal Ker Bethay Osse Wajibul Qatal Qarar De Diya Jata Hai. Duniya Mein Jaan Jati Hai Aur Akhrat Mein Azaab.
Spain Mein Ek Imam Masjid Logo K Rush Ki Wajah Se 2 Khutbay Aur 2 Jamaten Karwata Hai, Kya Yeah Durust Hai? Critical Question On Homosexuality:

Mein Zahri Shaklo Surat Mein Aur Medically Bhi Murd Hon Lekin Mujhe Aurton Mein Koi Interest Nahi Jiski Wajah Se Shadi Se Bhi Inkaar Kerta Hon Lekin Mujhe Mardon Se Attraction Hoti Hai. Meray Liye Islam Mein Kya Hukum Hai, Shadi Karon Ya Na Karon?

2-transgender Ki Kitni Iqsaam Hain Aur Iska Faisla Kaun Karay Ga?
3-transgender Ko Wirasat Mein Hissa Kaise Milay Ga?
4-transgender Kya Khud Apni Marzi Se Apna Gender Decide Ker Sakta Hai?

timestamps.text: Introduction
Islam Mein Muharram Ul Haram K Mahiney Ki Ehmiat Aur Fazilat Kya Hai?
Aik Aam Musalmaan Ko Muharram K Mahiney Mein Koi Khaas Naik A'maal Karne Chahiye Jo Saabit Hain?
Hussain A.s. Aur Yazeed K Maslay K Baray Mein Qayamat Mein Poocha Hi Nahi Jaye Ga To Is Par Behes Mein Ulajhne Ka Kya Faida Hai? Is Par Sukoot Ikhtiyar Karna Chahiye.

Agar Aj K Jadeed Dor Mein Kisi Waqiay K Baray Mein Koi Hatmi Raey Qaim Nahi Ki Jaa Sakti, To 1400 Saal Pehle Huay Karbala K Waqiay K Baray Mein Hum Koi Hatmi Raey Kaise Le Sakte Hain K Fulaan Shakhs Mujrim Tha?
Ahle Sunnat K Han Ye Mashhoor Hai K Yakum(1st) Muharram Ul Haram Ko Hazrat Umar R.a. Ki Shahadat Hui. Aap Ne Muharram Ul Haram K Introduction Mein Iska Koi Zikr Kyun Nahi Kia?
Muharram Ul Haram Mein Ahle Tashayyu' Ki Jaanib Se Jo Maatam, Jhoolay, Taabut Aur Is Tarha K Jo Af'aal Kiye Jatay Hain, Kya Ye Shari'i Tor Pe Durust Hain?
Jo Rafidhi, Yazidi Nasibi Aur Khariji Ki Istilaah Hain, Ye Sunni Aur Shia Tasal Mein Divide Ho Gai Hain Ya Inki Waqai Koi Asal Bhi Hai?
Ap Aksar Anbiya, Ahle Bayt Aur Sahaba K Naam K Sath Alaihissalam Lagatay Hain. Jabke Ahle Sunnat K Han Ye Sirf Nabi K Liye Khaas Hai. To Ap Ne Ye Shia Ki Rawish Kyun Ikhtiyar Ki Hui Hai?

Molana Tariq Jameel Ki Janib Se Kch Arsay Se Sayyiduna Ali A.s. Ko Maula Ali Kehne Ki Targheeb Dilai Ja Rahi Hai. Lekin Deoband K Apne Maktaba E Fikr Se Hi Unki Shadeed Mukhalifat Ho Rahi Hai Is Muamle Mein. To Aik Aam Admi Kidhar Jaey?
Tasal Ki Waja Se Har Firqe Mein Kharabian Ai Hain. Mehsoos Ye Hota Hai K Ap K Andar Bhi Ai Hain. Ap Ne Abhi Durood Shion Ki Tarha Parhtay Hain. Kya Apne Tasal Mein Aisay Parha Tha?

Ahle Sunnat Ki Janib Se Haq Chaar Yaar Ka Nara Lagaya Jata Hai. Jabke Doosri Jabi Ahle Tashayyu Israr Karte Hain K Panj Tan Paak Ka Nara Lagaya Jaey. Aik Aam Musalman Kis Taraf Jaey Aur Kiski Sunay? Aur Makkah Mein Aik Shakhs Panj Tan Paak K Nara Laganay Ko Kafir Kehta Hai Jabke Usko Haq Chaar Yaar Se Koi Masla Nahi. Iski Kya Daleel Hai?
Ahle Sunnat K Ulama Khaas Tor Se Muharram Mein Kehte Hain K Kala Libaas Pehenna Jahannamion Ka Shuaar Hai. Is Liye Kalay Kapre Pehenna Haram Hai. Ap Is Baray Mein Kya Kehte Hain?
Ap Ne Maulana Tariq Jameel Sahab Ki Kitab Guldasta Ahle Bait Ko Promote Kia Tha. Lekin Us Mein Bhi Sayyiduna Husain A.s. Ki Taraf Jhoota Afsana Mansoob Hai. Is Hawale Se Ap Kya Kehte Hain?
Ap Zakir Naik Ki Bohot Tareef Karte Hain Lekin Unho Ne Bhi Ibn Taymiyyah Ki Taqleed Mein Jannati Lashkar Wali Basharat Yazid Bin Muawiya Fasiq O Fajir Par Fit Ki Hai.
Apki Nazar Mein Dor E Jadeed Mein Ahle Sunnat K Konse Ulama Or Akabir Hain Jinho Ne Muhabbat E Ahle Bait Ko Ilmi Satah Par Muta'arif Karwaya Hai?
Agar Aaj Maulana Ishaq Zinda Hotay Aur Ap Unke Mukhtalif Interviews Karte To Ummat K Liye Ye Kis Tarha Ka Muamla Hota?
Umooman Nasibi Ulama Ki Janib Se Durood Mein Aal E Muhammad Se Murad Ummat E Muhammadia Ko Lia Jata Hai. Kya Unka Ye Moaqqif Ilmi Aitebar Se Durust Hai?
Sayyiduna Husain A.s. Ko Sayyid Ul Shuhada Ka Laqab Kyun Dia Jata Hai Kabke Rasoolullah Ne Ye Laqab Khud Apni Zindagi Mein Uhud K Muqam Par Hazrat Hamza Ko Dia Tha?
Baaz Nasibi Ulama Kehte Hain K Imam Husain A.s. K Naam K Sath Imam Nahi Lagana Chahiye Isse Shia Hazrat K Aqeeday Ki Boo Ati Hai. Is Baray Mein Apka Kya Kehna Hai?
Kya Aj K Dor Mein Yazeed Par Lanat Kar Sakte Hain? Aur Lanat Aur Bad Dua Mein Kya Farq Hai?
Yazeed K Madina Wale Kaarname Pe Roshni Daal Dein?
Kya Abdullah Ibn Umar Ne Yazeed Ki Bait Ki Thi Aur Doosro Ko Bhi Aisa Karne Ka Kehte Thay?
Kya Nabi S.a.w.w Ne Farmaya Tha K Khilafat Quraish Mein Rehni Chahiye?

Maula Ali K Aik Baitay Hain, Muhammad Bin Hanafiya, Unke Baray Mein Ata Hai K Unho Ne Hazrat Muawiya K Khilaf Jang Bhi Ki Thi. Lekin Ye Bhi Ata Hai K Unho Ne Yazeed Ki Tareef Bhi Ki Thi. To Aisa Tazaad Kaise Ho Sakta Hai?
Jab Hum Ahle Sunnat Ki Kitabon Se Ahle Bait Ki Shaan Bayan Karte Hain To Log Kehte Hain K Woh Riwayat Shia Raawion Se Li Gai Hain Ap Humein Kyun Pesh Kar Rahe Hain. Inka Kya Jawab Dia Jaey?
Qurb E Qiyamat Mein Imam Mahdi A.s. Ka Zuhur Hoga. Hamein Kaise Pata Chale Ga? Shia Kahein Ge Woh Shia Hain. Sunni Kahein Ge Woh Sunni Hain.
Ahle Sunnat Ki Kitabon Mein Imam Mahdi Ka Naam Muhammad Bin Abdullah Aya Hai, Jabke Shia Kitabon Mein Unka Naam Muhammad Bin Hasan Hai. Kya Is Ikhtilaf Pe Baat Karni Chahiye?
Ayat E Tatheer Ki Roshni Mein Ahle Bait Kon Kon Hain?
Ayat E Mawaddat Kya Cheez Hai?
Ayat E Mubahala Ki Roshni Mein Panj Tan Paak Kay Baray Main Wazahat Kar Dein.
Sayyidah Umme Kulsoom Binte Ali Sayyidah Fatima Ki Aulaad Theen. Kya Woh 6 Hijri Mein Paida Ho Chuki Theen?
Kya Hadith E Qirtaas Mein Waqiatan Nabi S.a.w.w Khilafat K Baray Mein Likhwana Chahte Thay?
Bagh-e-fadak K Waqiay Per Roshni Dalein
Kya Hazrat Umar R.a Ne Hazrat Fatima K Ghar Ja K Unko Dhamki Di Thi?

Kya Poultry Farm Ka Business Halal Hai Kyu Ke Suna Hai Ke Poultry Farm Ki Murghiyan (Chicken) Muzr E Sehat Hain ? Kya Broiler Chicken Ki Feed Khanzeer Se Banti Hai ?

Ali Bhai Aap Kehte Hein Ke Karhai Wala Kala Kurta Pehnna Sunnat Hai Lehaza Aap Se Request Hai Ke Aap Karhai Wala Kurta Pehan Kar Sunnat Par Amal Karen Aur Video Bhi Record Karwayen ? Nabi (Saw) Ke Tabarrukat Aur Baal Mubarak ? Kya Nabi (Saw) Ka Saya Mubarak Tha ?

Kya Plot Ki Khareed O Farokht Ke Doran Ya Maali Lain Dain Mein Jo Beyana Ki Raqam Guarantee Ke Tor Peh Di Jati Hai Aisi Raqam Ko Deal Cancel Hone Par Rakhna Halal Hai Ya Haram Hai ? Gham, Pareshani Aur Museebat Ki Khabar Milne Par Parhne Wali Best Duaa ?

Agar Kisi Ghair Muslim Mulk Mein Jumma Ke Ijtama Par Pabandi Laga Di Jaye To Kya Aisi Hakumat Ke Khilaf Jehad Karne Ka Fatwa Dein Gey Ya Hijrat Karne Ka Fatwa Dein Gey ? Jumma Ka Khutba Aur Taqreer Urdu Mein Ya Arabic Mein ? Jumma Ka Maqsad Kya Hai ?

Islam Mein Lay Palak Bachon Se Mutaliq Ahkam Aur Kay Gaud Liye Huwe Bachay Ke Walid Ka Naam Badal Kar Kaghazi Karwai Kar Ke Shanakhti Card Aur Pasport Bana Sakte Hein Aur Le Palak Bache Ko Wirasat Mein Kitna Hissa Mile Ga ? Jis Ghar Mein Fotgi Ho Jaye Us Ghar Mein Paida Huwe Bachay Ko Leke Jana Darust Hai Kyu Ke Log Kehte Hein Soodak Wale Ghar Mein Ja Ke Bacha Bimar Ho Jata Hai ? Kya Suraj Grahan Ka Asar Haamla Aurat Par Parta Hai ? Kali Billi Rasta Kaat Jaye Nahusat Ki Nishani ? Ilme Wahi Aur Ilme Science Part 1 ?

Sahih Bukhari 2321 Mein Hai Ke Nabi Saw Ki Nazar Ek Dafa Phaali Aur Aalat E Zaraat Peh Pari To Farmaya Jis Ghar Mein Khaiti Baari Ki Ye Cheezen Hoti Hein Wo Apne Sath Zillat Lati Hein, Is Hadees Ki Wazahat Farma Dein ? Nabi Saw Ke Ghar Ka Kharcha Waghera Kaise Chalta Tha Aur Kya Deen Se Kamai Karna Halal Hai ?
Kya Aisi Angoothi Pehnna Jaiz Hai Jispe Muhammad Rasool Allah Naqsh Kiya Gya Ho ? Kya Hum Mohr E Nabuwat Ke Design Wali Angoothi Pehen Sakte Hein ?
Kya Imran Naam Ke Nabi Guzre Hein Jinke Naam Peh Surah Aal E Imran Hai ? Aur Israeeli Riwayaat Ki Haqeeqat Kya Hai ?

Quran Mein Shifa Hai To Kya Quran Ka Maqsad Bimariyon Ka Ilaj Hai Ya Quran Insaniyat Ki Hidayat Keliye Nazil Kiya Gya Hai ? Kya Dam Darood Se Ilaj Karne Ki Ujrat Li Ja Sakti Hai ? Muhammad Saw Ke Ghulamon Ka Kafan Maila Nehi Hota ?
Kya Umar (Rz) Ne Quran Ki 1 Qirat Ke Ilawa Baki Qirat Parhnay Se Mana Kar Diya Tha ? Quran Ki 7 Qirat Ka Ikhtilaf ?
Lucky Kameti Mein Jiski Kameti Nikal Aati Hai Wo Ainda Kameti Nehi Deta Kya Ye Jaiz Hai ? Kya Qurra Andazi Ke Zariye Umrah Ka Ticket Lena Jaiz Hai ?

Saudia Mein Ulma Ko Jummah Ka Khutba Tahreeri Shakal Mein Diya Jata Hai Phir Sare Imam Masjid Wohi Likhi Hui Taqreer Beyan Karte Hein Aur Hukmaran Ko Defend Karte Hein Kya Ye Jaiz Hai ? Jummah Ke Khutbay Ka Ahel Kon Hai ?
Nabi Saw Ne Banu Qureza Ke Yahudiyon Ka Qatl E Aam Kyu Karwaya Tha Ghair Muslims Ke Aitraz Ka Jawab ?

Mard Ko Puri Zindagi Mein 4 Shadiyon Ki Ijazat Hai Ya Ek Waqt Mein 4 Shadiyon Ki Ijazat Hai ? Barelvi Deobandi Ab Khuwab Kyu Gharte Hein ? Ashraf Ali Thanvi Ki Ayesha (Rz) Ki Gustakhi ? Deobandi Buzurgh Qabar Se Bahir Nikal Aye ?
Qeyamat Ke Din Allah Nazar E Rahmat Nehi Farmaye Ga Is Hadees Se Kya Murad Hai ?

Israeeli Riwayaat Mein Shaitan Ka Naam Azazeel Aya Hai Aur Kya Iblees Pehle Farishta Tha Baad Mein Nafarmani Kar Ke Jin Ban Gya ? Kya Iblees Aalim Tha ? Kya Farishton Ko Ilme Ghaib Tha Farishton Ko Kaise Pata Chala Ke Insan Zameen Mein Fasad Aur Khoon Rezi Kare Ga ?

Tez Hawa Chalne Ki Waja Se Kabah Ka Ghilaf Urr Gya Aur Log Ajeeb O Ghareeb Baten Karne Lage Ke Ye Allah Ka Qehar Nazil Huwa Hai Kya Aisa Aqeedah Rakhna Sahi Hai ? Kya Khana Kabah Ke Oopar Se Koi Parinda Nehi Guzar Sakta ?
Umrah Ki Niyat Se Ehraam Pehna Lekin Rush Ki Waja Se Umrah Kiye Baghair Wapas Aa Gaye Kya Dam Wajib Ho Jaye Ga ?

Masjid Mein Aksar Namazi Mobile Band Karna Bhool Jate Hein Isliye Imam Masjid Ne Saza Rakhi Hai Ke Jis Namazi Ka Mobile Namaz Ke Doran Baje Ga Usko Jurmana Hoga Kya Ye Jaiz Hai ? Bijli Ka Bill Jama Na Karwane Peh Jurmana Aur Traffic Signal Torne Pe Jurmana ?

Hadeeson Mein Ata Hai Aise Shakhs Par Allah Ki Lanat Farishton Ki Lanat Aur Tamam Lanat Karne Walon Ki Lanat, Isme Tamam Lanat Karne Walon Sy Kya Murad Hai Aur Kya Kisi Par By Name Lanat Ki Ja Sakti Hai ?
Ali Bhai Aap Google Aur Youtube Ko Hafizahullah Kehte Hein Jabke Isme To Ghalat Cheezen Bhi Hoti Hein ?
Kya Ghair Muslim Ko Apna Makan Rent Peh De Sakte Hein ?
Kya Hajr E Aswad Jannat Se Aya Huwa Pathar Hai Aur Kya Ye Kisi Ko Nafa Ya Nuqsan Deta Hai ?
Abdullah Bin Abbas (Rz) Jang E Jamal Aur Jang E Saffeen Mein Kiske Sath Thay Moaviah Ke Sath Ya Maola Ali (As) Ke Sath ? Kya Mushajrat E Sehaba Wali Hadeesen Beyan Karna Haraam Hai ?
Abdullah Bin Zubair (Rz) Puri Zindagi Aal E Umayyah Ke Khilaf Thay Lekin Phir Bhi Shia Unko Pasand Kyu Nehi Karte ?
Ek Aam Admi Deen Kis Tarha Seekh Sakta Hai Jabke Gaaon Mein Log Murghi Bhi Molvi Se Zibah Karwate Hein ?
Harmain Mein Ghair Muslim Ka Dakhila Mana Hai Kya Aam Masjid Mein Bhi Ghair Muslim Dakhil Nehi Ho Sakta ?
Kisi Bewa Ya Talaq Yafta Aurat Se Nikah Karne Ke Baad Uske Bachon Ke Pehle Baap Ke Naam Ki Jagah Apna Naam Likhwa Sakte Hein ? Kya Bachay Ke Baap Ka Naam Badal Sakte Hein ?
Teen Talaq Ke Baad Usu Aurat Se Dobara Nikah Karna Ho To Kya Halala Karwana Zaruri Hai Aur Halala Karwane Mein Kya Hikmat Hai ?

Abdullah Bin Umar (Rz) Ne Hazrat Ali (Rz) Ki Bait Nehi Ki Aur Dusri Taraf Wo Yazeed Ki Bait Tornay Ko Ghalat Samjhte Thay ? Abdullah Bin Umar (Rz) Aur Hazrat Hussain (Rz) Ki Natures Mein Faraq ? Hazrat Hussain (As) Ko Jannati Naujawano Ke Sardar Ka Title Kis Waja Se Mila Tha ?
Kya Sports Mein Kisi Ghair Muslim Ko Apna Idial Maan Sakte Hein ?
Kua Ghusal Karne Ke Baad Dobara Wazu Karna Zaruri Hai ?
Dukandar Chori Ki Cheezen Le Kar Aagay Sastay Daam Farokht Karte Hein Kya Aise Dukandar Se Cheezen Khareed Sakte Hein Jo Jo Chori Ka Maal Baichtay Hein ?
Kya Ghair Muslim Mulk Mein Ya Unki Hakumat Ke Under Job Karna Sahi Hai ?
Kya Daarhi Aur Sar Ke Baalon Mein Khushbu Lagana Jaiz Hai ?
Agar Koi Allah Ko Gawah Bana Kar Maqrooz Ko Bataye Baghair Apna Qarz Maaf Karde Aur Baad Mein Us Se Mutalba Kare To Kya Gunahgar Hoga ?
Kuch Ulma Ka Moaqaf Hai Aaj Kal Safar Jaldi Tay Hota Hai Is Liye Qasar Namaz 80 Km Par Hogi ?
Masjid E Quba Mein Rozana 2 Nafal Parhnay Se Har Dafa Hajj O Umrah Ka Sawab Mile Ga ?
Raat Ke Waqt Nakhun Katna Aur Sham Ke Waqt Jharoo Dena Mana Hai ? Kali Billi Rasta Kaat Jaye Nahusat Ki Nishani Hai Part 2 ?
Kya Aurat Kisi Ghair Muslim Mard Ka Jootha Pani Pi Sakti Hai Ya Ghar Mein Mehman Aa Jate Hein To Kya Aurat Ki Na Mahram Ke Glass Mein Pani Pi Sakti Hai ?
Agar Baap Apni Zindagi Mein Jaidad Ka Kuch Hissa Apne Kuch Beton Ke Naam Karde To Kya Baap Ke Marne Ke Baad Gift Kiya Huwa Hissa Bhi Wirasat Mein Taqseem Hoga ?

Ishraq Ki Namaz Parhne Keliye Fajar Ki Namaz Jamat Ke Sath Parhna Zaruri Hai ? Jiski Fajar Ki Sunnaten Reh Jayen Kya Wo Talu E Aftab Tak Masjid Mein Baith Rahe Ya Ghar Ja Kar Bhi Sunnaten Parh Sakta Hai ?

Mutanfal Ke Peechay Yani Nafil Wale Ke Peechay Farz Namaz Ki Niyat Kar Sakte Hein ? Taraweeh 8 Rakat Hai 16 Rakat Hai 20 Rakat Hai Ya Taraweeh 40 Rakat Hai ? Taraweeh Ka Asal Maqsad Kya Hai ?

Quran Ki Tilawat Ke Doran Agar Paon Peh Kharish Kar Li To Kya Usi Hath Se Quran Ko Choo Sakte Hein ? Tuch Screen Mobile Mein Bay Wazu Quran Parh Sakte Hein ?

Jaidad Mein Wirasat Ki Taqseem Ke Waqt Behnen Apna Hissa Bhaiyon Ko Chor Deti Hein, To Agar Baad Mein Bhai Acha Salook Na Karen To Adalat Ke Zariye Behne Dobara Apna Hissa Wapas Le Sakti Hein ? Diya Huwa Gift Wapas Lena Kaisa ?

Agar Miyan Biwi Jamat Karwa Rahe Hein To Aurat Pichli Saff Mein Khari Hogi Ya Imam Ke Sath ?
Baghair Ijazat Kisi Ka Wifi Ka Password Khol Kar Istemal Karna Jaiz Hai ?

Imam Bukhari Aur Imam Muslim Ke Mazar Kyu Banaye Gaye Jabke Ye Inki Taleemat Nehi Thi Aur Aaj Kal Mazaron Peh Jo Khurafat Aur Bay Hayai Ke Kaam Ho Rahe Hein Kya Buzurgon Ne Kaha Tha ? Kya Fiqah Shafai Aur Shia Ki Fiqah Mein Mazar Banana Haraam Hai ?
Kya Nabi Saw Ki Qabar Par Surkh Chadar Daali Gai Thi ?
Agar Shaikh Abdul Qadir Jilani Ko Ilme Ghaib Tha To Unho Ne Apni Kitab Mein Nabi Saw Ki Wiladat Ki Tareekh Das Moharram Kyu Likhi, Kya Allah Buzurgon Ko Ghaib Ka Ilm Ataa Farmata Hai ?
Agar Tawaf Ke Doran Pehle Chakar Mein Kandha Nanga Karna Bhool Jaye To Kya Tawaf Dobara Shuru Karna Hoga, Kya Dam Wajib Ho Jaye Ga ?
Kya Quran Mein Kisi Sehabi Ka Naam Aya Hai Aur Quran Mein Khulfa Rashdieen Ke Naam Kyu Nehi Aye ? Kya Quran Nabi Saw Ki Biography Ki Book Hai ?
Quran Mein Nabi Saw Ke Khatim Un Nabiyyeen Hone Ka Zikar Hai Lekin Kya Ye Zikar Hai Ke Quran Aakhri Kitab Hai ?
Allah Ne Kisi Aurat Ko Nabi Paighambar Kyu Nehi Banaya Yani Kisi Aurat Ko Nabuwat Kyu Nehi Mili ?

Sunnat E Moakida Aur Ghair E Moakida Ki Terms Kab Banai Gai ? Kya Farz Namaz Ki Teesri Aur 4thi Rakat Mein Fateha Ke Sath Surat Milai Ja Sakti Hai ? Darmiyane Tashahud Mein Darood Parhne Se Sajda Sehaw Wajib Ho Jata Hai ? Imam Abu Hanifa Ki Taraf Mansoob Jhoota Khuwab ?
Kya Puri Zindagi Baghair Shadi Ke Guzara Karna Aur Kabhi Nikah Na Karna Jaiz Hai ? Ibadat Mein Ghalow Karna Jaiz Hai ?
Kya Khudkushi Wale Ka Janazah Aur Kunwaray Boorhay Aadmi Ka Janazah Parhna Jaiz Hai Kyu Ke Suna Hai Jiski Shadi Na Ho Uska Janazah Jaiz Nehi Hota ?
Agar Imam Abu Hanifah Ki Koi Kitab Sabit Nehi Ti Itni Bari Fiqah Kaise Wajood Mein Aa Gai ? Kya Imam Ibne Abi Shaiba Bukhari Muslim Ke Ustad Thay ?

Regular Questions !!
Questioner K Kuch Khayalaat !! Tamam Firqon Ki Awam Ali Bhai Se Mohabbat Kyu Karte Hein ?
Ulma Farmate Hein Ke Ali Mirza Naya Firqa Bana Raha Hai Ab Aap Batayen Ke Ye Firqa Kyu Nehi Hai Aur Manhaj Kyu Hai ?

Kya Safar Ka Mahina Manhoos Hai Aur Islam Mein Nahusat Ki Kya Haisiyat Hai ? Biwi Mein Nahusat ? Kaali Billi Rasta Kaat Jaye Nahusat Ki Nishani, Kawwa Bole Mehman Aata Hai, Sitaron Ki Gardish Karobar Mein Bandish Keliye Kisi Najumi Ke Paas Jana ?
Kya Jang Ke Waqt Buzurgon Ne Qabar Se Nikal Kar Bom Pakre Aur Pul Bachaya Tha ? Jab Jhelum Mein Selaab Aya Tha To Mazaron Mein Pani Dakhil Nehi Huwa Tha ?

Aasmani Kitaben Taorat Injeel Aur Zaboor Tabdeel (Temper) Ho Chuki Hein Iska Kya Saboot Hai ? Agar Taorat Aur Injeel Mein Tahreef Ho Chuki Hai To Quran Yahud O Nasara Ko Unki Kitabon Ki Taraf Lautnay Ki Targheeb Kyu Dilata Hai ? Kya Musalman Par Taorat Aur Injeel Kitabon Ka Ehtraam Karna Wajib Hai ?

Kya Hindu Mazhab 5 Hazar Saal Purana Hai Aur Islam Naya Deen Haiaap Ne Aa Kar Zabardasti Logon Ko Musalman Kiya Aur Talwar Ke Zor Peh Islam Phailaya, Kyu Ke Quran Mein Likha Hai Kafiron Ko Jahan Pao Qatal Kar Do ?
Meraj Ke Moqa Par Nabi Saw Ke Sath Shaq Ul Sadar Ka Waqiya ?
Nabi Saw Ke Jisam Par Mohre Nabuwat Aur Mohre Nabuwat Wali Angoothi ?
Kya Nabi Saw Ne Yahudi Ke Paas Apni Zirra Girwi Rakhwa Kar Anaj Liya Tha ?
Kya Nabi Saw Ko Tamam Ambia (As) Ki Khasusiyat Hasil Hein Aur Nabi Saw Ko Tamam Ambia Ke Mojizay Ataa Kiye Gaye Hein ? Kya Nabi Saw Ko Tamam Ambia (As) Ki Fazeelaten Hasil Hein ?
Fatah Makkah Ke Moqa Par Nabi Saw Ne Abu Sufiyan Ke Ghar Mein Dakhil Hone Wale Ko Amaan Di, Nabi Saw Ne Banu Umaiyyah Ko Ye Khasusiyat Kyu Di ? Khulfa Rashideen Ki Kya Fazeelat Hai ?
Kya Hazrat Umar (Rz) Ki Shahadat Ko Islami Tareekh Ki Sab Se Pehli Dehshat Gardi Kaha Ja Sakta Hai ? Kash Moaviah (Rz) Maola Ali (Rz) Ki Baiat Kar Lete To Aaj Ummat Do Tukron Mein Taqseem Na Hoti ?
Qadiyani Haq Baat Qabool Kyu Nehi Karte ? Kya Ali Mirza Ka Koi Rohani Baap Nehi Hai ? Qadiyaniyon Ko Dawat E Islah ?
Kya Jurwan Bachon Ki Pehchan Keliye Unke Chehray Peh Till Banwaya Ja Sakta Hai ?

Kya Bachay Ka Naam Roohullah Ya Zabeehullah Rakh Sakte Hein ? Bachon Ke Naam Farishton Ke Naamon Par Rakhe Ja Sakte Hein Aur Israeel Naam Rakhna Kaisa ? Kya Abdul Rahman Naam Ke Bande Ko Sirf Rahman Keh Kar Pukar Sakte Hein ?
Nabi Saw Ke Daur Mein Khatnay Kaise Hote Thay Kya Aurten Khatna Karwa Sakti Hein ? Ghair Zaruri Baal Saaf Karne Keliye Ustra Ya Cream Use Kar Sakte Hein ? Choti Daarhi Rakh Sakte Hein ?
Allah Ki Nafarmani Mein Maani Hui Mannat Ka Kaffarah Kya Hai ? Agar Ek Talaq Di Hai To 3 Mahinay Baad Dobara Nikah Karna Pare Ga ?
Namaz Mein Khushu Khuzu Se Kya Murad Hai ? Kya Tafseer Ibne Abbas Mein Rafa Yadain Ki Nafi Aai Hai ?
Ehraam Ko Surf Ya Sabun Se Dhone Se Khushbu Aa Jati Hai Kya Khushbu Wala Ehraam Pehen Sakte Hein ?
Ghar Damad Banna Kaisa ?
Kya Daarhi Ki Shave Is Niyat Se Kar Sakte Hein Ke Daarhi Ghani Uggay Gi ?
Daarhi Ki Waja Se Log Mujhe Hafiz Ji Kehte Hein Jabke Main Hafiz Nehi Hon ? Kya Sehaba Ne Madrasay Banaye Thay ?
Barelviyon Ki Green Pagri Firqay Ki Alamat Hai Ya Unity Ki ?
Saudi Ulma Ka Laal Rumal Kiski Sunnat Hai ? Ali Mirza Bhai Apne Huliye Se Kis Frqay Ke Lagte Hein ?
Pakistan Mein Choti Daarhi Rakhne Par Tanqeed Hoti Hai Jabke Saudia Mein Aksar Logon Ki Daarhi Choti Hoti Hai ? Kya Saudia Ke Log Deen Mein Hujjat Hein ?
